exercise.title: Product of Three Numbers

p.i: Can you use JavaScript to compute the product of three numbers and write the product into the browser console?

exercise.p: Define the following four variables: first, second, third, product. Assign 5 to first. Assign 7 to second. Assign 10 to third. After that, compute the product of the values of these three variables and assign the result to the variable product. Finally, write the value of the variable product into the browser console.
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
